greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is 1 plus the number of divisors of n.
comment: a(n) is the number of times that every divisor of n occurs in the coordinates of divisors of n mentioned in A337360 (Corneth).
a(n) = 3 if and only if n is prime.
a(n) is even if and only if n is a square.
link: David A. Corneth, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = A212356(n) for n >= 3. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 27 2020
results.author: _David A. Corneth_ and _Omar E. Pol_, Aug 25 2020
